1: שְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> אַתָּ֨ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> עֹבֵ֤ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Thou [art] to pass over</n> הַיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> לָבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>to go in</n> לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> גְּדֹלִ֥ים <sup>1419 </sup> <n>greater</n> וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <sup>6099 </sup> <n>and mightier</n> מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> עָרִ֛ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>than thyself cities</n> גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> וּבְצֻרֹ֖ת <sup>1219 </sup> <n>and fenced up</n> בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>to heaven</n>
2: עַֽם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>A people</n> גָּד֥וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> וָרָ֖ם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>and tall</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> עֲנָקִ֑ים <sup>6062 </sup> <n>of the Anakims</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>whom thou knowest</n> וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and [of whom] thou hast heard</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יִתְיַצֵּ֔ב <sup>3320 </sup> <n>[say] Who can stand</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> עֲנָֽק׃ <sup>6061 </sup> <n>of Anak</n>
3: וְיָדַעְתָּ֣ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Understand</n> הַיּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>therefore this day</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that it</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> הֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> הָעֹבֵ֤ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>[is] he which goeth over</n> לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>fire</n> אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>thee [as] a consuming</n> ה֧וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> יַשְׁמִידֵ֛ם <sup>8045 </sup> <n>he shall destroy</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and He</n> יַכְנִיעֵ֖ם <sup>3665 </sup> <n>them and he shall bring them down</n> לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before thy face</n> וְהֽוֹרַשְׁתָּ֤ם <sup>3423 </sup> <n>so shalt thou drive them out</n> וְהַֽאַבַדְתָּם֙ <sup>6 </sup> <n>and destroy</n> מַהֵ֔ר <sup>4118 </sup> <n>them quickly</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath said</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>as the LORD</n> לָֽךְ׃

5: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>for</n> בְצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>Not for thy righteousness</n> וּבְיֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <sup>3476 </sup> <n>or for the uprightness</n> לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of thine heart</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בָ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>dost thou go</n> לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצָ֑ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>their land</n> כִּ֞י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> בְּרִשְׁעַ֣ת ׀ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>doth drive them out</n> הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of these nations</n> הָאֵ֗לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> מוֹרִישָׁ֣ם <sup>7564 </sup> <n>but for the wickedness</n> מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וּלְמַ֜עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> הָקִ֣ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>thee and that he may perform</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>sware</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n> לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>Abraham</n> לְיִצְחָ֖ק <sup>3327 </sup> <n>Isaac</n> וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>and Jacob</n>
6: וְיָדַעְתָּ֗ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Understand</n> כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>because</n> בְצִדְקָֽתְךָ֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>it for thy righteousness</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>therefore that the LORD</n> אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֧רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַטּוֹבָ֛ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thee not this good</n> הַזֹּ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> קְשֵׁה־ <sup>7186 </sup> <n>churlish</n> עֹ֖רֶף <sup>6203 </sup> <n>stiff-necked</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>

16: וָאֵ֗רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And I looked</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>you had indeed</n> חֲטָאתֶם֙ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>and behold ye had sinned</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[and] had made</n> לָכֶ֔ם עֵ֖גֶל <sup>5695 </sup> <n>calf</n> מַסֵּכָ֑ה <sup>4541 </sup> <n>you a molten</n> סַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>5493 </sup> <n>ye had turned aside</n> מַהֵ֔ר <sup>4118 </sup> <n>quickly</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַדֶּ֕רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>out of the way</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>had commanded</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
17: וָאֶתְפֹּשׂ֙ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>And I took</n> בִּשְׁנֵ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>the two</n> הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <sup>3871 </sup> <n>tables</n> וָֽאַשְׁלִכֵ֔ם <sup>7993 </sup> <n>and cast</n> מֵעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>them out of</n> שְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>my two</n> יָדָ֑י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hands</n> וָאֲשַׁבְּרֵ֖ם <sup>7665 </sup> <n>and brake</n> לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>them before your eyes</n>
